dashboard.subtitle: AI-powered strategic deliberation platform
dashboard.configureProvidersDesc: Add your OpenAI, Anthropic, or custom endpoints
dashboard.createAgentDesc: Build specialized AI agents for your deliberations
dashboard.startASessionDesc: Run a multi-agent deliberation on your topic

agents.title: AI Agents
agents.subtitle: Create and manage specialized AI agents for deliberations
agents.name: Agent Name
agents.apiProviderHint: Leave empty to use Lovable AI, or select your own provider
agents.temperatureHint: Lower = more focused, Higher = more creative
agents.systemAgentReadOnly: System agents are read-only and cannot be modified
agents.systemAgentProviderHint: You can only change the provider for system agents
agents.systemAgentAppearanceHint: You can change the icon, image, color and provider for system agents
agents.noAgentsDesc: Create your first AI agent to start building deliberation teams
agents.configure: Configure your AI agent's personality and capabilities
agents.atlasDescription: Describe what kind of agent you need and Atlas will design a complete, production-ready agent specification for you.
agents.atlasPlaceholder: Example: I need an agent that can analyze legal contracts and identify potential risks, compliance issues, and unfavorable clauses. It should be thorough but also practical in suggesting alternatives.
agents.unlimitedTokensHint: Remove token limit - agent can use as many tokens as needed

oneOnOne.title: 1 on 1 Chat
oneOnOne.selectAgentPrompt: Select an agent to start chatting
oneOnOne.startChat: Start a conversation with this agent
oneOnOne.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

rooms.title: Rooms
rooms.description: Rooms define the interaction rules for deliberation sessions
rooms.noCustomRooms: You haven't created any custom rooms yet.
rooms.methodologyDesc: Choose the working approach for this room
rooms.workflowDesc: How agents interact with each other
rooms.defaultAgentsDesc: Select agents that will participate in sessions in this room (optional)
rooms.tavilyDesc: Fast web search for facts and news
rooms.objectiveTemplateDesc: Define a template for session objectives. Use {topic} as a placeholder.
rooms.systemRoomReadOnly: System rooms are read-only. You can use them as a base to create your own.

analytical_structured.label: McKinsey Strategic Analysis
analytical_structured.description: Structured analytical approach with MECE decomposition and Pyramid Principle. Ideal for complex problem-solving and due diligence.

strategic_executive.label: OKR/BSC Planning
strategic_executive.description: Balanced Scorecard for evaluating decisions across multiple perspectives: financial, customers, internal processes, growth. Ideal for strategic planning.

creative_brainstorming.label: Creative Brainstorming
creative_brainstorming.description: Design Thinking with different thinking roles. Divergent idea generation, then convergence. Ideal for innovation and ideation.

lean_iterative.label: Lean Startup Validation
lean_iterative.description: Build-Measure-Learn cycle for rapidly testing hypotheses. Ideal for idea validation, MVP, and pivot decisions.

parallel_ensemble.label: Multi-Perspective Analysis
parallel_ensemble.description: Independent parallel analyses from different specialists, then final synthesis. Ideal for critical decisions and multi-perspective analysis.

group_chat.label: Group Chat
group_chat.description: Open discussion format without specific methodology.

cyclic.label: Cyclic
cyclic.description: Agents take turns in successive rounds, building on the previous discussion.

sequential_pipeline.label: Sequential (Pipeline)
sequential_pipeline.description: Each agent processes and passes to the next, like a phased process.

concurrent.label: Parallel
concurrent.description: All agents respond simultaneously, then results are aggregated.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.subtitle: View and manage your deliberation sessions

sessionView.clickStart: Click "Start Session" to begin the deliberation

newSession.title: New Session
newSession.chooseRoomDesc: Select a room with a pre-configured methodology or create a custom session
newSession.askAdvisor: Ask the Room Advisor AI for the ideal configuration
newSession.topicPlaceholder: e.g., Should we expand into the European market?
newSession.objectivePlaceholder: What specific outcome are you looking for?
newSession.selectAgentsDesc: Choose at least 2 agents to participate in the deliberation
newSession.globalProviderDesc: Select a provider and click 'Apply to All' to set it for all selected agents
newSession.describeNeed: Describe what you need to deliberate on...

roomAdvisor.title: Room Advisor
roomAdvisor.subtitle: Describe your goal and receive personalized advice on room configuration
roomAdvisor.placeholder: Describe what you want to achieve...
roomAdvisor.welcome:
Hi! I'm the Room Advisor, your AI consultant for configuring deliberations.

Tell me what you want to achieve in your next work session and I'll recommend:
- The most suitable **methodology** (McKinsey, OKR, Brainstorming, Lean, Ensemble)
- The ideal **workflow** (cyclic, sequential, parallel)
- The most appropriate **agents** for your goal
- The recommended number of **rounds**

For example, you can tell me:
- "I need to evaluate whether to invest in a new product line"
- "I want to generate ideas for an innovative marketing campaign"
- "I need to decide whether to acquire a competitor startup"
roomAdvisor.error: Unable to contact the Room Advisor

settings.title: Settings
settings.addProviderDesc: Configure a new AI provider with your API key
settings.configuredProvidersDesc: Your API keys are stored securely and used for agent interactions
settings.noProvidersDesc: Add your first API provider to get started

marketExpansion.name: Market Expansion Analysis
marketExpansion.description: Evaluates new market opportunities with a structured analytical approach. Agents analyze from financial, legal, strategic and critical perspectives.

productRoadmap.name: Product Roadmap Prioritization
productRoadmap.description: Balances stakeholder needs using OKR/BSC methodology. Agents evaluate features across financial impact, customer value, and strategic alignment.

investmentDecision.name: Investment Decision Review
investmentDecision.description: Concurrent multi-perspective analysis for investment decisions. Financial, legal, and strategic specialists analyze simultaneously for comprehensive due diligence.

partnershipEvaluation.name: Strategic Partnership Evaluation
partnershipEvaluation.description: Evaluates potential partnerships through creative brainstorming. Analyzes terms, synergies, and strategic fit with collaborative ideation.
